### getAnalysisUsage() {#ad5509857d884eab759de5c011843e3d4}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86expandpseudo-cpp/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86expandpseudo-cpp">X86ExpandPseudo.cpp</a>.

getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.

### expandPseudosWhichAffectControlFlow() {#ae098004b498509f3f788e2a29fa9a95b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool X86ExpandPseudo::expandPseudosWhichAffectControlFlow (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF)</>}>
This function expands pseudos which affects control flow.

It is done in separate pass to simplify blocks navigation in main <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/globalmergefunctions-cpp/#ab1172d7b7736569e908ce727bfb3e358">pass(calling expandMBB)</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86expandpseudo-cpp/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86expandpseudo-cpp">X86ExpandPseudo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
